ResearchProjectDef.label: Ancient Tech Basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Uncover the secrets of the earth by discovering ancient mechanisms, along with breaking down humans for their blood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Ancient Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build rudimentary autonomous defenses using ancient technology and blood mechanites.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ancient Turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: More advanced turrets crafted from ancient technology- the rock catapult and acid launcher, along with upgrades for the dart trap and fearful effigy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ancient Efficiency
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use lost techniques to collect dirt in bulk, combine and break down mechanisms, and have living humans donate their blood.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thinking Engines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Copy the technology of the engines that fall from the sky and think for themselves, and learn how to craft specialist weapons and armour.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Death-Like Sleep
ResearchProjectDef.description: Copy the technology of the crypts that keep outworlders in a state of preservation and learn how to craft defensive armour and weaponry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blood Machines
ResearchProjectDef.description: Copy the technology of the blood machines that hunt us and learn how to craft fearsome armour and weapons.
